Eclipse GlassFish

Open Source Jakarta EE Platform Implementation

Breadcrumbs

  1. Home
  2. Eclipse GlassFish
  • Download

    Distributions, Release Notes
  • Documentation

  • Support

    Professional Services or Support

Jakarta EE Compatibility

Eclipse GlassFish is a Compatible Implementation of a number of Jakarta EE Specifications. For each specification we are required by the Eclipse Foundation Technology Compatibility Kit License to publish a summary of the TCK results.

Jakarta Platform, Full Profile

  • Jakarta Platform, Full Profile 9.0

Jakarta Platform, Web Profile

  • Jakarta Platform, Web Profile 9.0

Jakarta EE 9 Component Specifications

Jakarta Annotations

  • Jakarta Annotations 2.0

Jakarta Authentication

  • Jakarta Authentication 2.0

Jakarta Authorization

  • Jakarta Authorization 2.0

Jakarta Concurrency

  • Jakarta Concurrency 1.1

Jakarta Connectors

  • Jakarta Connectors 1.7

Jakarta Debugging Support for Other Languages

  • Jakarta Debugging Support for Other Languages 1.0

Jakarta Deployment

  • Jakarta Deployment 1.7

Jakarta Enterprise Beans

  • Jakarta Enterprise Beans 3.2

Jakarta Enterprise Web Services

  • Jakarta Enterprise Web Services 1.0

Jakarta Expression Language

  • Jakarta Expression Language 3.0

Jakarta Interceptors

  • Jakarta Interceptors 1.2

Jakarta Managed Beans

  • Jakarta Managed Beans 1.0

Jakarta Management

  • Jakarta Management 1.1

Jakarta Messaging

  • Jakarta Messaging

Jakarta Security

  • Jakarta Security 1.0

Jakarta Server Faces

  • Jakarta Server Faces 2.3

Jakarta Server Pages

  • Jakarta Server Pages 2.3

Jakarta Servlet

  • Jakarta Servlet 4.0

Jakarta Standard Tag Library

  • Jakarta Standard Tag Library 1.2

Jakarta Transactions

  • Jakarta Server Pages 2.3
  • Jakarta Transactions 1.3

Jakarta WebSocket

  • Jakarta WebSocket 1.1

Jakarta Web Services Metadata

  • Jakarta Web Services Metadata 1.1

Jakarta XML Registries

  • Jakarta XML Registries 1.1
